API Collection# RandomAccessCollection Implementations

## [Topics](/documentation/Swift/Array/RandomAccessCollection-Implementations#topics)

### [Instance Properties](/documentation/Swift/Array/RandomAccessCollection-Implementations#Instance-Properties)

[`var endIndex: Int`](/documentation/swift/array/endindex)The array’s “past the end” position—that is, the position one greater than the last valid subscript argument.[`var startIndex: Int`](/documentation/swift/array/startindex)The position of the first element in a nonempty array.### [Instance Methods](/documentation/Swift/Array/RandomAccessCollection-Implementations#Instance-Methods)

[`func distance(from: Int, to: Int) -> Int`](/documentation/swift/array/distance(from:to:))Returns the distance between two indices.[`func formIndex(after: inout Int)`](/documentation/swift/array/formindex(after:))Replaces the given index with its successor.[`func formIndex(before: inout Int)`](/documentation/swift/array/formindex(before:))Replaces the given index with its predecessor.[`func index(Int, offsetBy: Int) -> Int`](/documentation/swift/array/index(_:offsetby:))Returns an index that is the specified distance from the given index.[`func index(Int, offsetBy: Int, limitedBy: Int) -> Int?`](/documentation/swift/array/index(_:offsetby:limitedby:))Returns an index that is the specified distance from the given index, unless that distance is beyond a given limiting index.[`func index(after: Int) -> Int`](/documentation/swift/array/index(after:))Returns the position immediately after the given index.[`func index(before: Int) -> Int`](/documentation/swift/array/index(before:))Returns the position immediately before the given index.### [Subscripts](/documentation/Swift/Array/RandomAccessCollection-Implementations#Subscripts)

[`subscript(Int) -> Element`](/documentation/swift/array/subscript(_:)-25iat)Accesses the element at the specified position.[`subscript(Range<Int>) -> ArraySlice<Element>`](/documentation/swift/array/subscript(_:)-53fvb)Accesses a contiguous subrange of the array’s elements.### [Type Aliases](/documentation/Swift/Array/RandomAccessCollection-Implementations#Type-Aliases)

[`typealias Index`](/documentation/swift/array/index)The index type for arrays, `Int`.[`typealias Indices`](/documentation/swift/array/indices)The type that represents the indices that are valid for subscripting an array, in ascending order.
